DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Three Psychoeducational Group Interventions Veterans With Tinnitus
DOC.detailed_description: Tinnitus ( i.e. , ring ear ) currently prevalent disability VA system . Numerous clinical intervention create systematically address range issue cause tinnitus . Only tinnitus intervention focus cop strategy . Coping strategy cognitive , affective , behavioral attempt master new event , onset disability impairment like tinnitus , overwhelm individual , newness , individual necessarily automatic , adaptive response . Evidence suggest CET effective facilitating adaptive coping strategy among individual several type impairment disability . The propose study first application CET tinnitus population . The present study propose development CET protocol tinnitus pilot study assess effectiveness CET ACT intervention compare current clinical practice use CBT intervention . All 3 psycho-educational intervention compare usual care group . The overarch goal propose pilot study gain information use provide individual tinnitus best care help successfully cope tinnitus . The aims research : 1 ) develop CET protocol tinnitus mean information gather two focus group CET consultant ; 2 ) examine whether 3-session CET psycho-educational intervention effective 3-session CBT psycho-educational intervention 3-session ACT psycho-educational intervention , compare usual care , increase cop strategy among individual tinnitus .
